CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'DFJ_DK'), ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'Testamente_DK') ), 'https://www.totalliv.dk/event-landing/' & Related_Event_ID__c, IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'FA_SE'), ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'Testamente_SV') ), 'https://www.totalliv.se/forelasning/' & Related_Event_ID__c, '' ) )
CustomField.label: Event URL
